name: Papyrus Script
summary: Learn about .PSC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Once you create your PSC file, place it in the Data/​Scripts/​Source location in your Skyrim installation directory. You can then compile the script and create a plugin by loading the appropriate .ESM file(s) in Creation Kit.

description: Source code file written in the Papyrus language; used to create a plugin for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim; contains functions that define events that occur in the game, such as a message or the behavior of a character.
